sn35.82:4.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā … pe …
sn35.82:4.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.82:5.1: * “‘Loko, loko’ti, bhante, vuccati.
sn35.82:5.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, lokoti vuccatī”ti?
sn35.82:5.6: Rūpā lujjanti, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ lujjati, cakkhusamphasso lujjati, yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi lujjati … pe …
sn35.82:5.8: mano lujjati, dhammā lujjanti, manoviññāṇaṃ lujjati, manosamphasso lujjati, yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi lujjati.
sn35.82:5.9: Lujjatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā lokoti vuccatī”ti.
